name: Mithril ringmail
data: It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It has superb armour class for its type (nice in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'purity of spirit'.
